articles.title: Bonobos Can Tell When a Human Doesn’t Know Something - Scientific American
articles.description: An experiment shows that bonobos can understand when a human lacks knowledge and point them in the right direction
articles.content: A few captive bonobos recently faced a seemingly simple task: locate a tasty snack hidden under one of three cups. Because bonobos are brainiacs, pinpointing the cup with the treat should have been n… [+4822 chars]
